name: Bows by eXoticforms
description:
Bows are crafted from weatherproof aluminum, which means they maintain their appearance year-after-year regardless of cold, wind, rain or snow—plus they’re 100% recyclable. Standard cut to 36 inches wide, Bows fill any space indoor or outdoor with not only a stunning new holiday decoration, but a piece of artistic design handmade by an American craftsmen. Strong yet light and lithesome, Bows are put up and taken down easily by using the mounting loops provided on the back and fold up to be stored in the original box that they are shipped in for maximum efficiency.  Put a “bow” on your 2011 holiday season. Order your Bows today!

*Display brilliantly
*Last a lifetime
*Fold up to be stored
*100% recyclable
*Designed and hand-made in the U.S.A
